articles.description: In January this year, DCX Systems raised ₹500 crore via a QIP issue. Shares of DCX Systems Ltd ended at ₹379.15, up by ₹17.80, or 4.93% on the BSE.
articles.content:
DCX Systems, manufacturer of cables and wire harness assemblies, on Monday (July 1) said it has received a significant contract from Larsen & Toubro Ltd, India.
The purchase order, valued at 1,2… [+1526 chars]

articles.author: Jomy Jos Pullokaran
articles.title: NMDC Business Update | Production and sales drop in June - CNBCTV18
articles.description: NMDC Business Update | Total production for June 2024 stood at 3.37 million tonnes (MT), down from 3.48 MT in the same period last year. Shares of NMDC Ltd ended at ₹251.65, up by ₹5.50, or 2.23%, on the BSE.
articles.content: State-owned NMDC Ltd on Monday (July 1) released its business update for June, reporting a year-on-year decline in both production and sales.Total production for June 2024 stood at 3.37 million tonne… [+1782 chars]
